title: KAYLE SKIN
body:
i got banned for 14 days 5 days ago,so i cant play a game this week  will i get the skin?
please no hate.

replies.body: Per the [announcement](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/riot-games/announcements/thank-you), as long as you played within the last couple of months you'll be able to get the skin!  You should be able to in this case!  Let me know if you have any questions.

thank you porcoles.
note:please tell riot to nerf yasuo.
